This is the homepage for INFO 523 - Data Mining and Discovery taught by [Dr. Greg Chism](https://gregtchism.com) in Fall 2023 at The University of Arizona. All course materials will be posted on this site.

You can find the course syllabus [here](/course-syllabus.html) and the course schedule [here](/).
